articles.title: Former Red Sox pitcher Austin Maddox sentenced to 3 years in prison for soliciting a minor
articles.description:
Maddox, 34, pleaded guilty Thursday to meeting a minor to do unlawful acts and unlawful use of a two-way communications device.

The post Former Red Sox pitcher Austin Maddox sentenced to 3 years in prison for soliciting a minor appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Austin Maddox, 34, sentenced to 3 years for soliciting a minor.
Maddox pleaded guilty on September 12 to unlawful acts involving a minor.
The case raises concerns about child safety in Boston communities.

articles.title: Former Patriots DE Deatrich Wise Jr. suffers season-ending injury
articles.description:
Wise endured a quad injury during Thursday Night Football.

The post Former Patriots DE Deatrich Wise Jr. suffers season-ending injury appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Deatrich Wise Jr. suffered a season-ending quad injury during Thursday Night Football.
Wise played for the New England Patriots before his injury on September 12, 2025.
His absence may affect the Patriots' defensive lineup and performance this season.
